name: Schwarzer Kreis
description:
Stealth stripped to the core with a minimalist inspired art style. The current version includes one tutorial level and two first levels with enemies and puzzles.

Looking forward to some feedback.

Controls:

WASDmovement1/2/3/4 or mouse-wheelchange your shapeF (near loot)pickup Q/Erotate left/rightQ (near enemy) temporarily disable enemySHIFTsprint (makes noise)ESC (hold)exit gameR (when hit 3 times by enemy)reload level, spawn at checkpoint

Known Issues:

  • the enemies get stuck easily and are too fast, this is next on the agenda
  • player can clip through huge parts of the geometry if so inclined
  • the sound effects are ... not great
  • I need a good control sheme for controller to manage moving, changing shape and rotating at the same time in hectic situations
